item.title: Negroni
item.description: The Negroni is my favorite drink. It’s quite sweet, but also bitter and complex. I make mine with Tanquery gin and Cocci di Torino vermouth. It can also be served on the rocks, but I prefer it neat. 1 oz London dry gin1 oz Campari1 oz Sweet vermouth Add all ingredients to a shaker along with plenty of ice. Stir for 15–20 seconds and strain into a coupe glass.
